item.description:
Details
Come see the magnificant floral interpretaiton of the artwork from The Worcester Art Museum's collection. It's a feast for the eyes and in the middle of winter! Presented in partnership with Tower Hill Botanical Gardens. www.towerhillbg.org, www.wam.org (Worcester Art Museum)

The Museum comes alive for our 6th Annual Flora in Winter celebration. Worcester Art Museum and Tower Hill Botanic Garden collaborate to host Flora in Winter, the premier floral design event of the year. Skilled artisans from across New England create clever, provocative interpretations at both venues. It is a succulent feast for the eyes and spirit in the middle of winter!

Instrumental Music
Sunday, January 27, 12-2PM
Selected Public Spaces
Enjoy the musical ambiance as you stroll through the Museum.

Museum Caf√© Hours
Thursday - Sunday 11AM?3PM


Worcester Flora in Winter Hours at the Worcester Art Museum
Thursday, 11AM-5PM. Museum reopens from 6-8:30PM for Flora Euphoria.
Friday, 11AM-5PM, Saturday, 10AM-5PM*, Sunday, 11AM-5PM
General admission: $10.00 per adult
*There will be no free admission at the Worcester Art Museum Saturday morning, January 25, except for Museum Members. Free Saturday mornings from 10AM?noon will resume following Flora in Winter.

Art Museum?s presentation of Flora in Winter is generously sponsored by Unum and Flagship Bank and Trust. Additional generous support provided by the Worcester Telegram & Gazette and WICN Public Radio 90.5 FM, New England?s Jazz and Folk Station (taken from WAM's website)
item.why: This has become a yearly event and is truly magnificant. I know it's a distance for many but it is a wonderful event. Carpooling is an option...
item.name: FLORA IN WINTER '08 at The WAM
